meta.title: Shelton Beascochea | Arizona President, Stand With Crypto
meta.description: Meet Shelton Beascochea, the grassroots organizer mobilizing 55,000+ advocates and turning Arizona into the Silicon Desert for crypto innovation.

hero.name: Shelton Beascochea
hero.title: Arizona President, Stand With Crypto | Founder, Devils DAO & Crowd Ctrl
hero.tagline: Activating Arizona’s 55,000 crypto advocates to build the next Silicon Desert.

about.summary: Shelton Beascochea is a Phoenix-based organizer bridging policy, capital, and culture to catalyze Arizona’s crypto renaissance.

origin_story.headline: From venture operations to grassroots leadership.
origin_story.copy: After steering $30M AUM at Verdure Capital and advising fintech ventures, Shelton turned to community building—assembling Devils DAO, co-founding Crowd Ctrl, and mobilizing Stand With Crypto.

inflection_point.headline: Ethereum Phoenix: proof of concept.
inflection_point.copy: As co-host of the inaugural Ethereum Phoenix, Shelton united founders, regulators, and creatives—showing how civic maturity and culture can move capital to Arizona.

mission.headline: Activate Arizona as the nation’s most compliant, collaborative crypto hub.

pillars.title: Grassroots Power
pillars.description: Mobilize 55,000+ Stand With Crypto advocates to influence policy and unlock opportunity.

pillars.title: Silicon Desert Vision
pillars.description: Leverage billions in chip manufacturing, wealth migration, and creative talent to build a new frontier.

pillars.title: Community Syndicates
pillars.description: Blend DAOs, film collectives, and investor networks into a modern corporate playbook.

project.name: Stand With Crypto Arizona
project.problem: Arizona’s explosive crypto potential needed coordinated leadership to channel policy, capital, and community momentum.
project.solution: Shelton orchestrates weekly Stand With Crypto meetups, large-scale events like Ethereum Phoenix, and partnerships with BitAngels, AI Film 3, and Devils DAO to align stakeholders.
value_proposition: Connect with 55,000+ Arizona crypto advocates ready to support compliant innovation.
Tap a network spanning policy leaders, chip manufacturers, creatives, and venture capital.
Bridge grassroots energy with institutional maturity for founders seeking capital and clarity.

experience.headline: Welcome to Arizona’s crypto syndicate.
copy: Weekly meetups cultivate relationships across policy, finance, engineering, and film.
Ethereum Phoenix proves Arizona’s appetite for regulatory-first crypto innovation.
Devils DAO, Crowd Ctrl, and Pizza DAO collaborations showcase cultural momentum.

features: Statewide advocacy campaigns tailored to regulatory priorities
Founder-friendly pitch platforms in partnership with BitAngels
Creative showcases with AI Film 3 and I Film 3 ecosystems
On-ramps to Devils DAO, Crowd Ctrl, and AZ Crypto & AI Council communities

traction.advocacy_network: 55,000+ Stand With Crypto advocates activated in Arizona with 12 billionaires and 150,000 millionaires in state.
traction.event_momentum: Ethereum Phoenix launched with BitAngels, I Film 3, and Stand With Crypto collaboration, setting stage for 2026 expansion.

call_to_action.headline: Ready to help build the Silicon Desert?

highlights: Chapter President of Stand With Crypto, leading weekly mobilization across Arizona.
Head of Business Development at AI Film 3, bridging creatives and blockchain communities.
Founded Devils DAO and Crowd Ctrl to align capital, advocacy, and culture.
Former Verdure Capital COO overseeing $30M AUM across digital and physical assets.
Part of Pizza DAO’s Mafia Fam and stewarding AI Film 3 & Ethereum Phoenix initiatives.

quotes.speaker: Shelton Beascochea
quotes.text: The state of Arizona is a blank slate. It’s a playground—and people have a lot of opportunity here.

quotes.speaker: Shelton Beascochea
quotes.text: Billions of dollars have been brought to the state specifically for chip manufacturing. This is proof of concept for Arizona being the next Silicon Desert.

quotes.speaker: Shelton Beascochea
quotes.text: My goal is not that PJ and I are the forefront—it’s that we activate communities so they can come to us and make these things larger.

quotes.speaker: Shelton Beascochea
quotes.text: Stand With Crypto alone has over 55,000 advocates here. It’s huge—and it’s a market that is not conquered.

timeline.event: Co-founded Verdure Capital, managing a $30M diversified portfolio of digital and physical assets.
Became Arizona Chapter President of Stand With Crypto, launching weekly meetups.
Founded Devils DAO and joined Pizza DAO’s Mafia Fam to align culture and capital.
Co-hosted the inaugural Ethereum Phoenix with AI Film 3, BitAngels, and Stand With Crypto.
Co-founded Crowd Ctrl to accelerate grassroots organizing across Arizona.

supporters.name: AI Film 3 / I Film 3
supporters.highlight: Provides venues and media reach for Ethereum Phoenix and cultural activations.

supporters.name: BitAngels Arizona
supporters.highlight: Hosts pitch competitions aligning founders with investors and regulatory mentors.

supporters.name: Stand With Crypto Advocates
supporters.highlight: 55,000+ Arizonans ready to engage in policy, investment, and adoption initiatives.
